forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.
